text:
TASMAC outlets will remain closed on January 16 on account of Thiruvalluvar Day, January 24 (Vallalar memorial day) and January 26 (Republic day).

Bars attached to the TASMAC outlets and bars in hotels should also be closed.

Action will be taken on violators, Collector R. Nanthagopal said in a press release.
title: TASMAC outlets to be closed
